name: Flora Park
venue: Wang Nam Kheo - Date: November 1, 2016 - March 31, 2017 at Wang Nam Kheo.
bio: Featuring fine art and flower exhibitions with more than 2,000 English roses. Don't forget to visit our Falmer Maket! For more information, visit out facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/FloraparkWNK.

name: Big Mountain Music Festival
venue: Khao Yai - Date: December 10 - 11, 2016 at Kang Krajan Country Club.
bio: Featuring bands on 6 stages. More information: http://www.bigmountainmusicfestival.com.

name: Khao Yai Trail Marathon
venue: Khao Yai - Date: October 2, 2016 at Khao Samer Dow Resort.
bio: Visiting Khao Yai by joining the trail marathon 2016. More information: https://www.facebook.com/events/488298494683398/
